name: gitea
tagline: A self-hosted Git service with repositories, issues, and collaboration tools
description: Gitea is a self-hosted Git service providing code hosting, pull requests, issues, CI, and container registry in a lightweight binary. It offers a polished web UI and runs on modest hardware, ideal for developer teams.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Host unlimited Git repositories with a polished web interface and Git protocol support

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Host Docker images and OCI containers with integrated package management

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Single executable with minimal resource requirements runs on modest hardware

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create teams, manage permissions, and organize repositories by organization

features.title: REST API
features.description: Comprehensive REST API for automation and integration with external tools
